field.label: Alternative title
field.hint: Enter an alternative title (e.g. translated title or short title)

field.label: Author(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the author(s).

field.label: Editor(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the editor(s).

field.label: Other contributor(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of other contributor(s).

field.label: Contributing institution
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the creating/contributing institution.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter a German and an English abstract. Please use "Add more" to enter abstracts in other languages.
field.required: You have to enter an abstract.

field.label: Edition
field.hint: Enter the edition of the research paper (leave empty for 1st edition).

field.label: Identifier(s)
field.hint: If the proceedings have any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes below.

field.label: Name of the original publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of original publisher.
field.required: You have to enter the name of the original publisher.

field.label: Place of original publisher
field.hint: Enter the place of the original publisher.
field.required: You have to enter the place of the original publisher.

field.label: Sponsor or funder information
field.hint: Enter the name of the sponsor or funder, and/or project/grant name or ID. Please use the following syntax if applicable: EC/FP7/12345/EU/ProjectName/ProjectAcronym. Please separate multiple entries by semicolon.

field.label: Version
field.required: You have to choose the type of the published version. For type "other" choose either draft for an early version, submittedVersion for the version that has been submitted for publication, acceptedVersion for the version that has been accepted for publication, publishedVersion for the final publication or updatedVersion for any version that has been updated since its first publication.

field.label: Name of the publishing institution
field.hint: The publishing institution is either "Technische Universität Berlin" or "Universitätsverlag der TU Berlin".
field.required: You have to choose whether TU Berlin or Universitätsverlag is publishing this item.

field.label: Access rights DNB
field.hint: Choose which rights the German national library (DNB) has to display archived items.

field.label: Access rights DNB
field.hint: Choose which rights the German national library (DNB) has to display archived items.
